description: Guernsey FC goalkeeper Chris Tardif will not retire at the end of the season, says assistant boss Colin Fallaize.
title: Guernsey FC 'keeper Chris Tardif 'will not retire this summer'
title_page: Guernsey FC 'keeper Chris Tardif 'will not retire this summer' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Guernsey FC goalkeeper Chris Tardif will not retire this summer, according to assistant manager Colin Fallaize.
The 35-year-old former Portsmouth and Oxford United keeper has been first-choice for his home island side since their formation in 2011.
He considered quitting football two years ago, but stayed on and helped the club reach the Isthmian League.
